snippet.title: Life is Strange 2 Official Reveal Trailer [PEGI]
snippet.description:
Pre-order Life is Strange 2 here: https://goo.gl/X9AdL9.
Find out all you need to know here: https://sqex.link/LiS2Revealed

The first of 5 episodes will release September 27, 2018 on Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC (Steam)! 

Two brothers Sean and Daniel Diaz, 16 and 9, are forced to run away from home after a tragic incident in Seattle. In fear of the police, Sean & Daniel head to Mexico while attempting to conceal a sudden and mysterious supernatural power.

Life on the road is tough and now totally responsible for his much younger brother, Sean begins to realize that his decisions will impact their lives forever…

Music used in this trailer: 
- Into the Woods by Jonathan Morali (Part of the score)

Follow us:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LifeIsStrangeGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LifeIsStrange
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lifeisstrangegame
Tumblr: http://lifeisstrange-blog.tumblr.com
VK: https://vk.com/lifeisstrange
Discord: http://discord.gg/lifeisstrange
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/user/officiallifeisstrange
Flickr: https://www.flickr.com/people/156942661@N04/

#LifeisStrange2
